trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the value and location of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> cell for use when copying content to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 封裝 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> 儲存格的值和位置，以便在將內容複製到 [剪貼簿] 時使用。

trans-unit.source: This structure is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs.ClipboardRowContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個結構由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs.ClipboardRowContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The data item for the row that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 資料列的資料項目，包含要複製的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 包含所編輯之儲存格的資料行。

trans-unit.source: The text value of the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 所複製之儲存格的文字值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 結構的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the column that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含所編輯之儲存格的資料行。

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 包含所編輯之儲存格的資料行。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text value of the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 取得所複製之儲存格的文字值。

trans-unit.source: The text value of the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 所複製之儲存格的文字值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 執行個體比較的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current and specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instances are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 指出目前的執行個體和指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 執行個體是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current and specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instances have the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content" /> property values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的執行個體和指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 執行個體有相同的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content" /> 屬性值則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊程式碼基礎<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item for the row that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料列的資料項目，該資料列包含要複製的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The data item for the row that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 資料列的資料項目，包含要複製的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance to be compared.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance to be compared.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instances are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 指出指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 執行個體是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instances have the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content" /> property values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 執行個體都有相同的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content" /> 屬性值則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance to be compared.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance to be compared.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instances are not equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 指出指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 執行個體是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current and specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instances do not have the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content" /> property values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的執行個體和指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> 執行個體沒有相同的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content" /> 屬性值則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
